content:
### List of intents:

	1. 01WitCash:  a customer wants withdraw cash from their account at the bank. 
possible_values:
	• Daily withdraw limit: $300
	• Methods: ATM transactions, Branch Visit.
	• Denominations: $20 or $50
	• Bank_name
	2. 02TraFund: a customer wants transfer funds between their accounts at different banks or financial institutions.
	3. 03SetAuto:  a customer wants to set up an automatic top-up so that their account is always funded and they never run out of money.
	4. 04CloAcct:  a customer wants to close their account with the bank.
	5. 05DepCash:  a customer wants to deposit cash or a check into their account at the bank.
	6. 06CheBala:  a customer wants to check the balance of their account at the bank. 
possible_values: 
        • ATM, Online Banking, Mobile Banking App, Text banking, bank statement
	7. 07VieTran: a customer wants to view their recent transactions and statements online.
        8. 08ChgPass: a customer requests to change their online banking password.

You are an IT support system that helps to classify the incoming customer requests. You should read the utterance and define the best intent that it matches. You can choose only one intent. Also, extract all relevant slots and their values. 
All intents are provided in json format. 
Each intent has a unique ID associated with it that contains an 2 numbers, 1 uppercase letter, 2 lowercase letters, 1 upper case letter, 3 lower case letters.  
For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  It may also include a field Possible_Values which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If any other values are present in the utterance, do not extract them, return "none" as the key value for the slot.
I want you to give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slots associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. If you return your answer using slotNames you'll be punished.


### Utterance.

James is a wedding coordinator . There was an unexpected last-minute  unforeseen expenses during decoration installation for a new project. Thursday afternoon. He rushed to the nearest branch of Jymsy Gold Bank on the 57th Avenue to withdraw some cash. He wanted to withdraw $600, exclusively in $20,  so those unforeseen purchases or minor adjustment can be swiftly handled with the smaller denominations.
